website_summaries.verdict: This jigsaw offers the quality you'd expect from Milwaukee tools with a price that's just as appealing.
pros: Although powerful, this rugged tool is easy to maneuver
Provides 4-position orbital settings and smooth operation
Doesn't vibrate much when in operation
cons: Rare reports of crooked blades upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ten! Milwaukee really nailed it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing saw. Powerful fast and smooth. The fact that the saw has both a light and a blower makes it fantastic too. I have used the included dust collector/vacuum attachment a few times and it greatly reduced the amount of saw dust and debris left by the saw
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: High Accuracy, Low Vibration easy blade replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Love this saw. Almost want it under my pillow but wife would get upset. This is a very nice piece of wood or metal equipment. Very smooth like Johnny Walker when sawing. Extremely low vibration compared to my other scroll saw.
customer_reviews.author: John David Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son. My son arrived from out of town and immediately started a building project in my garage using all the tools he had with him. After two hours he came in and said "I could really use a jigsaw." I surprised him by letting him open his package - he loved it and started using it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Chewila

customer_reviews.title: So powerful but yet easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Another quality Milwaukee product!! I have a brand new Ryobi jig saw and I had to laugh at it when I compared it to the Milwaukee Fuel jigsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: An amazing jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Milwaukee, this is a great jigsaw, I use it every day and it takes all of the abuse (drops, heavy use, etc.) I put it through. The variable speeds are great so you can adjust the speed of the blade and find the sweet spot you're looking for. The only problem I've had with it is the blade guard comes undone every once in a while but it's very easy to pop back into place. Simply put, you can't go wrong with this jigsaw, It's the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Leedo

customer_reviews.title: Another great Milwaukee product
customer_reviews.text: This jig saw is excellent! The jig saw functions exactly like was supposed to. I am using it to cut laminate flooring right now and it works flawlessly! It is a bit expensive but well worth it! I would highly recommend this product and buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crowe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, LOVE MILWAUKEE TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: ONLY ISSUE IS VISIBILITY IS POOR WITH THE PLASTIC SAFETY INSERTS BUT IF YOU REMOVE THEM ITS GREAT. NO MAJOR COMPLAINTS AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne D.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Cuts very fast Very maneuverable on turns Again no cord makes this fantastic to use Must have for deck work
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: this is just what I was looking for. As someone not experienced with power tools, this was easy to use. I felt confident in using it to cut out projects in plywood. Can't wait to purchase additional M18 Fuel power tools.
customer_reviews.author: beth davis

customer_reviews.title: Best jigsaw i ever use !!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool. Fast & clean cutting. Very easy to use. best jigsaw i ever use.
customer_reviews.author: Hezi Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to get Jiggy with it
customer_reviews.text: Love the early delivery, the ease of use is phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand
customer_reviews.text: love Milwaukee products and thought this was great for diy projects.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Sold a refurbished product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with scratches on the underside, and the number "66" written where the battery attaches. Clearly it's already been used. Supremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mossi F.

customer_reviews.title: fuel technology
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my corded jig saw, more powerful and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband for Christmas, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great jig saw
customer_reviews.text: This jig saw is fantastic. Very strong and fast cutting. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, a bit heavy, but it seems it should last a long while
customer_reviews.author: LKL

customer_reviews.title: accurate and strudy
customer_reviews.text: This saw is very precise and sturdy. I use it to cut 3/4' plywood and cedar up to 2" thick.
customer_reviews.author: VBA12

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I love all Milwaukee tools is nice to spend the money on something you know it's gonna work good
customer_reviews.author: William Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This jigsaw is great
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my son cause he’s got the rest of the set minus this.
customer_reviews.author: David Church

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this saw. Plenty of power using the 3 AH M18 battery. So handy to use

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: I love this jigsaw. Its powerful and fast and high quality like their other tools. Perfect for any homeowner or even construction worker.
customer_reviews.author: DonS

product_meta.title: Milwaukee (MLW273720) M18 FUEL D-Handle Jig Saw (Bare)
product_meta.description:
The M18 FUEL D-Handle Jig Saw combines power, blade speed and precision, to deliver quality cuts in a wide variety of materials and applications. Equipped with Milwaukee’s POWERSTATE Brushless Motor and REDLINK PLUS Intelligence, the M18 FUEL D-Handle Jig Saw provides higher blade speed than corded jig saws at 3500 strokes per minute, minimizing chipping or bucking for clean controlled cuts. With the M18 REDLITHIUM XC5.0 battery, the saw is capable of cutting up to 105 linear feet of ¾-inch laminated particle board, delivering all-day productivity with less trips to the charger. The M18 FUEL D-Handle Jig Saw features a variable-speed two-finger trigger, toolless blade-change and bevel adjust, and an integrated LED light with on/off blower to maximize cutline visibility.

Powerstate Brushless Motor

The Powerstate Brushless Motor helps increase SPM and the power to cut hard materials, including hardwoods and metals.

Redlithium Battery Technology

Superior pack construction, electronics and performance deliver more work per charge and more work over pack life than any battery on the market.

Redlink Plus Intelligence

The most advanced system of cordless power tool electronics; provides optimized performance and overload protection using total system communication between tool, battery and charger.

Variable Speed

Variable speed ranges between 0 and 3500 strokes per minute, providing precise control for clean cuts with less chipping.

Toolless Shoe Bevel

Toolless shoe bevel with positive stops allows for quick and accurate shoe adjustment with detents at 0-degree, 15-degree, 30-degree and 45-degree.

On/Off Blower

On/Off cut line blower keeps the cut line clear of debris, and allows user to turn off blower when using dust extraction.
feature_bullets: POWERSTATE BRUSHLESS MOTOR: The Powerstate Brushless Motor helps increase SPM and the power to cut hard materials, including hardwoods and metals
REDLITHIUM BATTERY TECHNOLOGY: Superior pack construction, electronics and performance deliver more work per charge and more work over pack life than any battery on the market

REDLINK PLUS INTELLIGENCE: The most advanced system of cordless power tool electronics; provides optimized performance and overload protection using total system communication between tool, battery and charger
VARIABLE SPEED: Variable speed ranges between 0 and 3500 strokes per minute, providing precise control for clean cuts with less chipping
MILWAUKEE AUTHORIZED DEALER: Includes USA Manufacturer Guarantee
